body_html:
+1. I have the same problem as @rlrs, @mightyroy, @mlinxiang & @MingStar: I can't load variables with tf.Saver.restore() if they were created with tf.get_variable().

I can easily use the workaround described by @rlrs for some of the variables, but I can't find an easy way to do the same with variables that were created with a call to tf.nn.rnn(...), which uses tf.get_variable().

body:
+1. I have the same problem as @rlrs, @mightyroy, @mlinxiang & @MingStar: I can't load variables with tf.Saver.restore() if they were created with tf.get_variable().

I can easily use the workaround described by @rlrs for some of the variables, but I can't find an easy way to do the same with variables that were created with a call to tf.nn.rnn(...), which uses tf.get_variable().
